AI Description: musl is a lightweight, fast, simple, and secure C library that targets modern Unix systems. It is designed for embedded systems, performance-critical applications, and other resource-constrained environments where a small footprint is essential.
Core Features: Lightweight & Fast C Library, Secure & Reliable Implementation, Optimized For Modern Unix Systems, Ideal For Embedded Systems & Resource-Constrained Environments
General Tags: C Library, Embedded Systems, Performance Optimization, Resource-Constrained Environments
